website_summaries.verdict: Both teens and older women alike will appreciate this all-inclusive manicure and pedicure set.
pros: Offers nine attachments to buff and shape your nails
Can also remove corns and calluses
Built-in water bucket for dipping fingers
Includes a fan for drying nail polish

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Compact Electric Manicure Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little kit that I think young preteens and teens would enjoy receiving as a gift. It's an all in one unit that serves as a bubbly finger bath, all the shaping tools for fingernails, and then a dryer for fingernail polish. An adult receiver of this item as a gift may feel they would rather have a more substantial powerful set of tools and forego the bath and dryer, which is what happened in this case.
customer_reviews.author: steadyreader

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it and was very happy with the end result of my manicure. I looked up some videos on Youtube to help figure out what the bits were used for. The fan of course isn't too strong but gets the job done, overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this nail manicure! It has helped me save tons of money, and I get to do my own nails! It comes with a tool to clean your nails and form it as well and it has so many different heads based on your need! There is also a bucket that you can put iced water in to soak your nails in as well as a quick dryer underneath that helps dry your nail polish faster! It’s super easy to use no matter how basic or professional you are because this product gives you all the tools you need to have perfect nails!
customer_reviews.author: Ke Xu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My Sister bought this for my Grandaughter. She usually does her nails daily.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Perkins

customer_reviews.title: What is a Headline
customer_reviews.text: This was meant as a Gift & the Recipient likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Another Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL!!
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use...works well, is professional and gets the job done.Has lots of different attachments that come in handy.Lightweight but not flimsy.Would recommend this. Getting my nails manicured in a professional way. Good unit. Im pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Talavera

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy she is so happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter and she loves it. She has been giving everyone in the family and the neighborhood manicures!! I am so happy she is so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item as a gift for someone, and they like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Vanie75

customer_reviews.title: Good Christmas gift option
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It is very easy to assembly. I bought this for myself, after few times try. I will buy another for my bestie as the Christmas gift. I had lots of Gel nail polish. Now with the lights I will be able to do my nails at home. This piece is just beautiful! I highly recommend this product. It could be a good Christmas gift .
customer_reviews.author: Adeline

customer_reviews.title: Designed for Teenage girls
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that the Manicure set did not come with a clippers or small scissors. Also it would have been nice to have a little book or hints or instructions. It designed, colored and displayed as something a teenage girl would like as a gift. It does make a nice gift but would have been better with a little hint or help book and a set of clippers.
customer_reviews.author: pacificshepherdess

customer_reviews.title: Litchi mani/pedi kit
customer_reviews.text: I gave this kit 4 stars because when I went to plug the adapter into the main unit to charge it the tip of the adapter broke inside. I tried to find another adapter on line and was not successful. The kit stated no returns so I had to order another kit just to get the adapter .
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A. Ned

customer_reviews.title: Must to have if you want to DIY your nails
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It came in within 2 days just as expected. This whole set helps me to get my nails ready. It has multi functions, it helps you trim your nail, remove that dead skin. You could even add water on the side to help you clean it. It is very easy to install by choosing different end. You will get everything you need for you nail.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday was the first day I use the product, can I love it I wouldn't have to go to the nail salon anymore. It has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Nita L.

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: The Box was ripped but the actual product looked intact, I didn't have time to use it or try it rigjt away but I just tried it and it doesn't work at all. It doesn't let me return the product and I am really mad of the money I just waisted!! I would gladly change my review if I could at least be able to return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone to do their nails
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice. I love thst you dont have to use the plastic clear hands tools this is so much nicer and you dont have to sorry about the water spilling. The tools weré alittle hard to put in but after the second time its easy. I love that the drill is charging while in case. The dryer is great.
customer_reviews.author: donnac96

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my step daughter that is 11. Works good but isn't to powerful. Which is good for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stephinie Simons

customer_reviews.title: Good  product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it makes it so easy to do a professional looking manicure. I do my nails every week and I am always trying to get my nails to dry before I mess them up, the built in dryer is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin situ

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work since i bought it out the box. I wish i could return
customer_reviews.author: bermzuaau

customer_reviews.title: Good kit but very little instruction in how to use
customer_reviews.text: Good manicure and pedicure kit but the instructions lack guidance in how to use kit
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I will junk it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. Wouldn't even give it one star. Why I turn it on and touch it to my nails it stops turning, move it off then it turns. I will junk it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: The long-awaited manicure machine has complete functions and good polishing. With this manicure machine, you can operate it at home. It looks good and has powerful functions
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas gift for my wife so I really don't know yet how good it is but I've had great success with Amazon except for one so I'll go ahead and give it a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Dees

customer_reviews.title: My drill hardly works after 2 uses. It only ...
customer_reviews.text: My drill hardly works after 2 uses. It only works if I squeeze extremely hard. It worked very well the first use though 😒
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this product again - false advertising
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get my charger for this product- I have emailed serveral time I haven’t gotten a response abt this matter ! I would recommend you buy this
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Would rebuy anyday!
customer_reviews.text: All the tools work perfectly, and every part works on the machine. Came with everything it was suppose to. Came on time, and came in perfect condition. No dented/damaged packaging , or anything at all. Its so perfect I can't wait to use it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: teah glass

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for a gift. It is light and compact but works well, especially for home use. She likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: really likes it.Full on kit for doing your own nails at home. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gutzman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very professional and easy to use kit. I can enjoy my own manicure at home now! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect birthday gift for my sister. She loves it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks simple but it works very well.
customer_reviews.text: It have all the necessary tools I need this way I can do my own manicure/pedicure at home.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I can keep my nails up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can keep my nails up myself with out having to go and pay money every week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WISH I HAD NEVER BOUGHT IT. IT DOES NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: WISH I HAD NEVER BOUGHT IT. IT DOES NOT DO THE JOB I NEEDED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it It work great It's a great present for
customer_reviews.text: Love it It work great It's a great present for Mother's
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product twice since I purchased it a few weeks ago. Now, upon trying to use it again its overheating after 5 minutes of use and slowing to a stop. DISAPPOINTED to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Carrie & Kids

customer_reviews.title: Finger bath doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Product came otherwise intact, but bubbly finger bath doesn’t work (straight out of the box), which was my main reason for the purchase. Amazon will not accept a product return on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the second use. The top piece of the drill snapped off while I was using it, and even though it easily snapped it back on the drill hasn’t worked since.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: You can’t return it!
customer_reviews.text: The water tank is leaking. You can not return the product! I didn’t like the anything about it. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: is damaged don't let me returned is so sad
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, is damaged don't let me returned is so sad
customer_reviews.author: carmen carpio

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This item lacks power. No returns, not happy with product or service!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: initially I gave this product only 3 stars because some of the attachments would fly off the handle. A representative contacted me to have me explain the problem to him. I explained what the problem was and he sent me a whole new set, which works perfectly. I've never had such good customer service from any other company. I highly recommend if you are considering buying any products from this company you will not be disappointed. I've told all my family and friends and am positive they will be purchasing products very soon. Thank you Vincent for all your caring and help.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D. Tachera

customer_reviews.title: Few instructions
customer_reviews.text: I think I would like this if it included instructions for the tips and what they are used for. It contains a small pamphlet with scant labels written in print, so tiny that you need a magnifying glass. There is nothing to describe each tip's purpose. A search online also left me empty handed. I was hoping for a video or a website...anything that would help.
customer_reviews.author: camerabug

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I has multiple heads which are great to change out for cuticles, nails, and toe nails. Its multiple setting make it really manageable to use. Sometimes these tools really hurt your skin if you accidentally touch the side of your finger, but this one is gentle enough to not hurt you. It's strong on the nail but gentle on skin. I got this as a gift and I didn't even know I needed it, but now I love it! They also have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: but regardless the tools included are very useful and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend and she really enjoys using it. Apparently the fan and “UV light” don’t really do much to expedite the drying process, but regardless the tools included are very useful and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pedicure tools for hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to help with toenail and callous trimming and it works great. Have to leave it mostly plugged in, as the battery runs down fairly fast, but pleased with the results, especially on hard to reach places. Thanks!.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stopping
customer_reviews.text: Does not have enough speed to sand powder on nails, keeps stoping. Very nice for a kid set but with the stopping don’t think this is for an adult. And not being able to trade for something that will work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Not taking charge
customer_reviews.text: The adapter don't want to take charge so for me to see if it was the machine I have a plug that would fit from another device and it works so can I get another replacement adapter sent out to me?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: The tips spin off - not good for hard jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Fl Girl 01

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I received the manicure set few weeks ago.The product got here when expected and everything looks very nice. This would even be a great gift for someone. Works well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennia M

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my little sister. She loves it! It is so cute and so convenient to get the nail done.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute -Stylish- Complete Nail Care
customer_reviews.text: So light weight and compact. Has my nails looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Fat Tapper

customer_reviews.title: They dont hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine 6 months ago. Loved it, but all of a sudden it will not charge. Tried charging both ways, handpiece alone and handpiece in cradle. Will not take a charge!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was easy to use, and all the stuff works great. Plus I got great info on what was what and what they are used for in an email.
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with all of the attachments
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. Very happy with all of the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and I bought this one for my daughter in law and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Love the whole kit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this whole kit! All items very useful, and fast delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Butterflynut

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: nice and useful, but not very strong or long charger life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best electric manicure set. A variety of files. Fits my need for hand and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Booso

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to work on my grandmother s toes they have bad fungus. This system and tools seem mainly for finger nails but they did a decent job on my grandmother's toes.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a second one for my daughter and granddaughter! Loved mine so much, I wanted them to have one!!! I especially like that you can charge the device and use it without cord or if the power runs out, you can plug it into the device and keep going!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn L. Weidman

product_meta.title: Litchi Electric Manicure Pedicure Kit, 13-in-1 Complete Nail Care Set, Soften, Shape, File, Buff, Shine Nails, Remove Calluses & Cuticles, Rhodamine Red
feature_bullets: 【PRESENTING EVERY WOMAN’S BEST FRIEND! 】 This amazing manicure pedicure kit has practically any manicure pedicure tools a girl needs to have perfect, flawless nails for every occasion! It includes numerous accessories and interchangeable attachments that will help give the perfect shape and smooth and shiny surface to your nails!

【SET UP A NAIL SALON ON YOUR LIVING ROOM! 】Once you get your hands on our premium manicure and pedicure set, you can have your personal nail salon anytime you want. Forget about making appointments and spending hundreds of dollars; get your nails done whenever and however you want!

【MULTIPLE ATTACHMENTS & ACCESSORIES! 】This fully equipped manicure and pedicure device boasts nine different attachments that file, buff, shape, and remove calluses, corns, and cuticles! Moreover, it has a practical water tub where you can soak your fingers, AND a built-in fan to dry your nail polish!

【IDEAL FOR PROFESSIONAL & HOME USE! 】 Whether you are a professional nail artist that needs a reliable piece of equipment for your work or an amateur that loves meddling and experimenting with different colors and shapes on your nails, our manicure pedicure device is just what you need for your creations!

【ORDER WITH PEACE OF MIND! 】 We have absolute faith in our fantastic manicure and pedicure set – after all, we’re using it ourselves! In fact, we are so confident that it’s the best deluxe set your money can buy, that, in case you aren’t perfectly happy with it, we back it up by a 30-day money-back guarantee AND a one-year warranty!
